game.name: War of Banners
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Start with a handful of soldiers and rise to become a lord who shakes the battlefield!" The game is a medieval-style strategy/real-time combat RPG. Explore a vast land, raise your knights, and conquer new territories. A free mercenary, a loyal noble, or the ruler of an empire. Choose your path.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Start with a handful of soldiers and rise to become a lord who shakes the battlefield!" The game is a medieval-style strategy/real-time combat RPG. Explore a vast land, raise your knights, and conquer new territories. A free mercenary, a loyal noble, or the ruler of an empire. Choose your path.
